name: Portraits of Doom
summary: Portraits of Doom is a 20 map set for Doom I and Doom II. The first episode takes place in Doom I, followed by a special New Game Plus in Doom II. This NG+ features Doom II weapons and monsters. It also reimagines the first episode, complete with different progression at times. For instance: things that exploded in the first episode now lie in ruin in NG+. All combined into one single Doom II wad file for your convenience.
